description.value: Born with a connection to the earth, gaia zhier tend to have slightly stronger-built bodies with keratin scales layered down their spine. With their natural control over themselves on land, they can curl into wheels and roll at high speeds through any environment.

system.classDetails:
Gaia Zhier Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Armored Spine: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.17W19EQIIK1KKGK2]{Armored Spine}
  • Looped Locomotion: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.L0UH4P8W9JXB2HPS]{Looped Locomotion}
  • Beast Buddy: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.PKQIMUZG3I9TP6W0]{Beast Buddy}
